title: Support players should get less LP than the rest of the team
body: Laziest, easiest role in the game, it's insulting that any Janna player should ever get the same LP as their AD carry.

replies.body: The bait is showing OP.

adcs should get minimum 50lp for winning a game and a maximum of -10 lp if they lose


cause they 'carry' the game

/thread

Junglers should only get LP if they gank at least 3 times each lane before 15 mins.
No reason in getting points if you don't do your job right.

Why do so many gamer gurls play support? it's because it's the easiest role for them to play while getting carried by friendzoned nerds. It takes no mechanics, no skill and no balls.

1. You said *Gurl* and *Gamer Gurls* ,You also tried to emphasise that the friend zone exists, i would say that you were *friend zoned*. Most supports are harder mechanically  then some adcs, graves is easy mechanically , ashe is too, quinn even.. so many adcs easier then supports.
I play blitz and carry half the game normally..
what drugs are you on mate?
dese is some high quality memes thank u op
You should stop talking you know nothing and making yourself look stupid they deserve more then your ass does…

How would you implement this? If you are playing a support champion you get less lp? It's fucking hard to convince people in low elo to support, but if they are going to get less lp, why would people want to?

> [{quoted}](name=Quayer5,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9BOx112m,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-24T11:50:01.338+0000)

Yeah, or when i go 0/0/60 and my adc goes 0/13/0 (10 cs) and we still win i should get less lp?
Except you've never gone 0/0/60 and, even if you had, it's pretty fucking easy to rack up assists when all you need to do is shield someone and run away while real players do work.
Not sure if you are either a troll or just a really unbelievebly bad player. Supports make adc's able to carry games. I1m done here.

Yet its harder to carry as support, making the role harder in some aspects. Also this is retarded what if they both go adc or an off pick? how can you tell? (Janna is harder then alot of adcs)

AHAHHAHA you're funny
They can TURN team fights so fking easy… 
Janna's ult Boom 5 man heal better then sorakas with a knock back for the Apc and adc. 
It might not seem a lot to you but when you play support you can see how much they carry the adcs. without a support might as well not have an adc they get rekt in lane 
It same as top lane or jungle you get to farm jungle 24/7 with yi and say its "God" when he actually comes out of it. Top lane home to nasus, tryndamere, yasuo and jax that farm top all fking game and do jack sht.. 
YEahhhh long reply but i dislike people like you that think support is useless -.-

So what you're saying is only supports see the value of supports? Just like how only management consultants see the value of management consultants? Face it, you're all useless and don't deserve full LP rewards.
